sentences: Erinevalt tema minu oli tegemist hoopis teise asjaga.
Töötajad erinevad omavahel palju oma oskuste poolest.
Erinevalt eelmisest aastast ei toimu sel aastal konverents.
context: The Estonian word 'erinevalt' is an adverb that expresses difference or contrast. It is formed from the root word 'erinev' (different) with the adverbial ending '-alt', indicating a state of being different in comparison to something else. It's commonly used when making contrasts between two things, people, situations, or time periods.
